decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (LM/09A Rev A & LM/02A Rev A received 22.11.16; LM/011C Rev D received 18.01.17; LM/01A Rev B, LM/03A Rev B, LM/06D Rev H, LM/016A Rev B & LM/17A Rev C all received 06.02.17; Location Plan (unnumbered) received 14.02.18; LM/26A Rev B, LM/27A Rev B & Planning Statement dated January 2018 all received 19.02.18) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 2 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 08:00 and 18:00 on Mondays to Friday and 09:00 and 13:00 on Saturdays, and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays, without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 3 - The finishes to the east elevation shall be implemented in accordance with the details agreed pursuant to the discharge of condition 4 under application reference 00312/2-2A/P2(4) as approved by the Local Planning Authority on 30th June 2017 (External Window & Door Details & Specifications (Interfusion) and drawing no. LM/020A Rev A received 5th May 2017).

Condition : 4 - (A). The unmarked room beneath the newly approved staircase as shown on drawing no. LM/26A Rev B, which was identified as a bin store on drawing no. LM/25A Rev C received 6th September 2017, shall only be used to accommodate the storage of refuse and recycling bins linked to the commercial property (unit 2A) and be implemented as such prior to its first use. 
(B). The area to the side of the living room of the dwelling at 2 Cranbrook Road shall only be used to accommodate the storage of refuse and recycling bins linked to the residential property in accordance with the details agreed pursuant to the discharge of condition 6 under application reference 00312/2-2A/P2(6i,7i) as approved by the Local Planning Authority on 24th October 2017 (Drawing no. LM/25A Rev C received 6th September 2017).

Condition : 5 - Prior to the first use of the development hereby permitted, the wall insulation to unit 2A shall be implemented in accordance with the details agreed pursuant to the discharge of condition 7 under application reference 00312/2-2A/P2(6i,7i) as approved by the Local Planning Authority on 24th October 2017 (Letter from KP Acoustics Ltd dated 13th April 2017, received 25th July 2017; Drawing no's LM/25A Rev C and LM/05C Rev F received 6th September 2017).
Condition : 6 - No fans, louvres, ducts or other external plant shall be installed without the prior approval of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 7 - The first-floor windows as shown on drawing no's LM/016A Rev B (west elevation) and LM/17A Rev C (north elevation) shall be obscurely glazed and non-opening, and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise in accordance with these requirements.
Condition : 8 - The three roof windows/sky lights as shown on drawing no. LM/27A Rev B shall be non-opening, and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise in accordance with this requirement.

Condition : 9 - The flat roof area above the ground floor office and workspace of the commercial unit (which shall contain three roof windows/sky lights) shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 10 - (A). Prior to the first use of the commercial property (unit 2A) hereby permitted, the internal doorway linking the northern access of the premises to the front office/reception at ground-floor, and the internal doorway at first-floor level, as shown on drawing no's LM/26A Rev B & LM/27A Rev B, shall be formed and thereafter retained in accordance with the approved plans.
(B). Unit 2A shall remain as one planning unit and at no time shall internal doors be blocked up.
description:
Variation of condition 2 to allow internal staircase following planning permission 00312/2-2A/P2 dated 27/3/2017 for
Alterations to front and side elevations including new windows and doors. Revised boundary treatment and roof alterations.
